lenders.name: The Jaeb's
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone's life - help some enterprising individuals become more self-sufficient and in the process benefit their family, neighbors and community.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell real estate in the San Francisco Bay Area of California.  We also help clients roll over their retirement funds into California real estate.

lenders.loan_because: life has offered us so many opportunities maybe we can do the same for someone else.

lenders.name: Miriam

why not?
helping others has always proved fulfilling.

lenders.occupational_info: I run a small company that integrates audio and video technology in homes and businesses.

lenders.loan_because: I can see the results of helping someone.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help people who need the assistance.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Having worked, studied, and traveled in many countries in Asia, I've experienced first-hand how terrible poverty is to the unfortunate many who are afflicted by this crime.  I hope that as programs such as Kiva grow in popularity, those of us who have been blessed by having been born into affluent societies will be able to more effectively help alleviate the suffering of those in developing countries.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I believe sustainable, homegrown, economic development is the best way to empower individuals and spread democratic ideals.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: of the need...."teach a person to fish and...."

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software for an Airline.

I have a good life - It's time to pay back

Walt Whitman

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.occupation: Admissions Director for a Skilled Nursing Facility
lenders.loan_because: I am able and appreciate the opportunity to help in places where I see need.

lenders.name: Ella

lenders.occupational_info: organizing home care for the elderly, disabled and recently hospitalized in Vancouver, BC, Canada

lenders.name: Mike and Katy
lenders.loan_because: Upon retirement, we went to Ethiopia as volunteers to live in a small village and  build a health center. It changed our lives forever. Part of that change was seeing what people are capable of if given a chance. We want to give others the opportunity to succeed in their dreams and pay back some of what life has given us.
lenders.occupational_info: Adventurers and volunteers for life

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: helping others responsibly is something I have been wanting to do all my life. I am 67 years old and am very pleased to be able to participate in this wonderful effort. Thank you  for giving me the opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a transportation business in San Antonio Texas. We deliver a variety of items over an area about one third of Texas.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: As a Christmas present my Aunt gave me a Kiva credit and I think it is an amazing present to be able to share.

lenders.name: Brynil
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible to contribute in a great way to great projects

lenders.name: Maximo Joe
lenders.loan_because: My Uncle and Aunt gave me money.
lenders.occupational_info:
We can dance if we want to
We can leave your friends behind
Cause your friends don't dance

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: If such a tiny amount of money can make such a significant difference in a few lives, then TOGETHER, we really can FINALLY make a huge impact toward changing the world.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: Christ tells us in Luke chapter 6, that we should give to everyone who asks, and to lend expecting nothing in return.  I loan because I believe Jesus would do so, and I'm following him.  If the loan is repaid, I'll loan it again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor, specializing in the care of patients with allergies and asthma.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Why not.

lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good that I am helping someone in need.

lenders.name: Noorin

lenders.name: Nuno Dias
lenders.loan_because:
It's extremely rewarding to be able to make a difference on other people's lives.
It allows me to directly help reduce extreme poverty and give others a much needed chance to improve their living conditions.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a research lab focused on signalling mechanisms of myelinating cells. Most common work I do is managing mouse colonies, preparing samples for electron microscopy and taking pictures of those samples.

We at Soulcial® SOLUTIONS believe: 
-  People WANT to be agents for positive change in their communities and the world.  
 - People WANT to give to a cause that speaks to their hearts. 
 - People WANT to have a choice in how they share their community currency.* 
  *Community Currency = The time, talent, treasure and truth you share with others in order to make your community a better, safer, and healthier place to live, work, play and pray

lenders.loan_because: Helping out those who may not have as many opportunities as myself to achieve their goals is thrilling.

lenders.name: The BBGB Family
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family with two parents, their three daughters, three sons-in-law, and seven grandchildren (ranging in age from 3 to 16). The Blums, Beckers, Glodowskis and Berryhills.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: not rich, yet fortunate

lenders.name: Kurian Tharakan
lenders.loan_because:
I want to give people access to opportunity.  KIVA gives us a simple, easy, way to to do this.

Do you want to help change the social ills that plague this world?  Help people get on their feet. Kiva is an incredibly innovative channel to do this!

lenders.name: Clay
lenders.loan_because: my travels lets me see who really needs my help

lenders.name: TheLynx
lenders.loan_because: I like to make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do their jobs.

lenders.name: charlie
lenders.loan_because: Giving people in less fortunate countries an opportunity to make a living will make the world a better place.

lenders.name: najia
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach middle school.  My husband is a soldier and we have 4 children.

lenders.name: Marv and Barb
lenders.occupational_info: Electric utility, civil service

lenders.name: Lacy Chenault
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The Messiah lives. Lives in me. and others.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to share my good fortune with others. I am grateful for all that has been bestowed upon me and the gift to share.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: something as little as $25 may seem insignificant, but it can change the life of someone else.

lenders.name: lockeyone
lenders.loan_because: I am a self employed person and have been for many years.  I can appreciate the need for cash to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I install, repair, service locks, make keys, and recommend other security services.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think we can improve the world intelligently through micro finance organizations like Kiva !

lenders.name: Tigger
lenders.loan_because: I like Kiva and Kiva loves people.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to have a positive effect on people that far exceeds the expense involved in doing so.
lenders.occupational_info: I assess insurance risk, and put a price on that risk.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help and share.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that we have an obligation to use our good fortune to support those throughout the world.

What may seem small to us can make a lifetime of difference in other countries

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little money, so little time, so little effort to make such a big impact in another person's life. Who wouldn't want to be part of it?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a large urban public school. I work with students in grades 6 to 8. I teach literacy--reading and writing. I have been a teacher for 20 years.

lenders.name: Wm H
lenders.loan_because: The Kiva program allows me to partner with other lenders in assist ing those wanting to help themselves. In this manner everyone gets to share in the warm fuzzy feeling of building a better world.

lenders.name: Cecelia and Bruce
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Robert Menasian
lenders.loan_because: This is the kind of world I want to live in where a need is met through a caring community. Thank you Kiva for giving me an opportunity to make a difference.

lenders.name: PineRidgeProducts
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance, someone gave me one and it is the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: We build small wind powered generators.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to offer help.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy working on computers, but I love to play music from other countries.

lenders.name: Jasmine
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to offer a hand up, not a hand out.  I've been able to reloan money several times now and it's great!

lenders.name: Doyle
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone to carry their own weight in the world.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I Repair and build The Plumbing and electrical parts of houses

lenders.name: Margen
lenders.loan_because: I was born into tremendous opportunity compared with some other people in the world, and I want to share that with those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a veterinary specialist's office doing IT and marketing work.

lenders.name: John Cammick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard working people start there own business which will provide a better life for there families.
lenders.occupational_info: Grow many different types of   Palm Trees from seedlings and sell as full grown trees to wholesale vendors.
